mods.abstract: Cactus Jack (Cliff Johnsen) reads the voice transcription for the Bob Wills Show, air date 1947-09-10, broadcast on KOWL, Santa Monica.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
